TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsToken extends System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement

summary.span: 表示能识别的单词或短语。

span.span: Represents a word or short phrase that can be recognized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的成员类，可以指定三种形式的单词：窗体窗体和自定义词。Using the members of the class, you can specify three forms of a word: the form, the form, and a custom for the word. 如果多个单词都存储在单个对象，每个被视为不同的令牌，在内部，然后在结果中。If multiple words are stored in a single object, each is treated as a different token internally and in the result. 此类表示`token`由 World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 定义的元素[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 1.0 版。](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)。This class represents the `token` element defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0.](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761). 璝惠 SRGS`token`元素，并通过 System.Speech，其支持有关的详细信息请参阅[令牌元素](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3a9e8d64-7bd4-4188-a6f4-dbf28ea71632)。For information about the SRGS `token` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [token Element](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3a9e8d64-7bd4-4188-a6f4-dbf28ea71632).

param.name: text
param.span: 新建 类实例的文本。

span.span: The text of the new class instance.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例并指定要识别的文本。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies the text to be recognized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建对象，其属性的值最初设置`text`参数。Creates a object whose property is set initially to the value of the `text` parameter.

member this.Display : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置需朗读的文本的显示形式。

span.span: Gets or sets the display form of the text to be spoken.

value.span: 标记应显示的表示形式。

span.span: A representation of the token as it should be displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管它们通常代表相同的值，但窗体可能会不同于形成一个词或短语中。Although they typically represent the same value, the form may be different than the form for a word or phrase in a . 例如，显示窗体可能首字母缩写词，如"USA"时将会被朗读的文本并向其适用，为"美国"。For example, the display form may be an acronym, such as "USA", while the text that will be spoken, and to which the applies, is "United States of America".

span.span: An attempt is made to set to .

exception.span: 试图将 指定为空字符串。

span.span: An attempt is made to assign an empty string to .

summary.span: 获取或设置应朗读的单词的书写形式。

span.span: Gets or sets the written form of the word that should be spoken.

value.span: 在 类别实例中包含的文本。

span.span: The text contained within the class instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管它们通常代表相同的值，但窗体可能会不同于形成一个词或短语中。Although they typically represent the same value, the form may be different than the form for a word or phrase in a . 例如，窗体可能是首字母缩写词，如"USA"时将会被朗读的文本并向其适用，为"美国"。For example, the form may be an acronym, such as "USA", while the text that will be spoken, and to which the applies, is "United States of America". 默认值为属性为空字符串，""。The default value for the property is an empty string—"".
